meta.title: Over 30 years' Experience in the Public & Private Markets

meta.name: description
meta.content: Hamon is an Asia-based asset manager founded in 1989 that has been managing institutional assets and deploying and managing capital for three decades.
Over 30 years' Experience in the Public & Private Markets
Hamon is an Asia-based asset manager founded in 1989 that has been managing institutional assets and deploying and managing capital for three decades.

vc_col-sm-12 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

p.span:
Deploying and Managing Capital
in Private Markets since 1992

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row home-2 skpt-100 skpb-100 skpx-100
vc_col-sm-7 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-30 skpt-15 text-sub skfwl
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-30 skpb-15 text-sub skfwl
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-22 skpt-30 skpb-30 text-light

div.p: Founded in 1989, Hamon Investment Group (Hamon) is an international asset management and investment group that is headquartered in Hong Kong, with over three decades of experience investing in public and private equity markets.

a.class: nectar-button jumbo see-through extra-color-2 skbtn fs-18 text-center w-205 mainbtn

div.class: vc_col-sm-5 imgshadow wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row home-2a skpb-100 skpx-100
vc_col-sm-5 imgshadow wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
vc_col-sm-7 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-22 skpt-30 skpb-30 text-light

div.p: Hamon is an inclusive and equal opportunity employer that is deeply committed to providing a conducive, collaborative and forward-looking workplace to nurture and grow talent.

a.class: nectar-button jumbo see-through extra-color-2 skbtn fs-18 text-center w-205 mainbtn

div.class: wpb_row vc_row-fluid vc_row full-width-section home-5 skpt-75 skpb-50

vc_col-sm-7 wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone
wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-22 skpt-30 skpb-30 text-light

div.p: Family groups have been a core client group of Hamon in both our public and private markets activities. Since 1989, Hamon has worked with a substantial number of family groups from Europe, the US and Asia.

a.class: nectar-button jumbo see-through extra-color-2 skbtn fs-18 text-center w-205 mainbtn

div.class: vc_col-sm-5 imgshadow wpb_column column_container vc_column_container col no-extra-padding inherit_tablet inherit_phone

wpb_text_column wpb_content_element fs-22 skpt-30 skpb-30 text-light

div.p: Our approach to corporate responsibility is focused on making impact through sustainable investing, creating a lasting positive impact in the communities where we live and conduct business, and having a well-rounded inclusive workplace.

a.class: nectar-button jumbo see-through extra-color-2 skbtn fs-18 text-center w-205 mainbtn

div.span: A site-wide Call to Action Section! Have you fallen in love yet?

li.class: menu-item menu-item-type-custom menu-item-object-custom current-menu-item current_page_item menu-item-home menu-item-2413

p.a:
10/F, 1001 Standard Chartered Bank
Building 4-4A Des Voeux Road Central
Hong Kong

div.div: @ 2023 Hamon Investment Group All Rights Reserved

div.a: INVESTOR ALERT: Please click here for information on a misleading group that are using the Chinese name of Hamon Asset Management Limited (i.e. a member firm of Hamon Investment Group) to confuse investors.

div.p: © 2024 Hamon.

div.h2: PRIVATE Markets Section of the website

div.h5: Please read the following before proceeding, as it explains certain restrictions imposed by law on the distribution of this information and the countries in which Hamon’s services and products are authorised for sale.
div.p: This website is owned and operated by Hamon. Your use of this website confirms that you have read and agree to the following Terms and Conditions of Use of this website.

Where applicable, the information on this website is only made available to Professional Investors as defined in the Hong Kong Securities and Futures Commission’s (“SFC”) Securities and Futures Ordinance (the “SFO”) and / or the Securities and Futures (Professional Investor) Rules (the “Rules”) and / or the paragraph 15 of SFC’s Code of Conduct for Persons Licensed by or Registered with the Securities and Futures Commission (the “Code”) and who wish to be treated as an Individual Professional Investor for this purpose.
div.h5: By accessing this website and clicking agree below, you are agreeing that you meet the requirements above and should be viewed as a Professional Investor.
div.p: The information on this website includes information about Hamon’s private investments established with variable capital incorporated with limited liability in the laws of their respective jurisdictions. Neither this website nor any documents contained in it constitutes investment advice or an offer or solicitation to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy shares of any investments, or any investment product (nor shall any such shares or product be offered or sold to any person) in any jurisdiction in which an offer, solicitation, purchase or sale would be unlawful under the securities law of that jurisdiction.
div.h5: By accessing this website you represent that you are permitted by the laws of your jurisdiction of residence to access this site and the information contained herein.
div.p: Investments mentioned in this website, or documents contained in it may not be suitable for all investors and should only be made on the basis of the relevant Offering Documents (which may comprise of the prospectus, simplified prospectus, supplement and product key facts statements) or other related documents and their terms and conditions, and upon appropriate advice from your investment advisor stockbroker, lawyer, accountant, bank manager or other professional advisor. The information contained in this website may be updated at any time. None of the information, whether in part or full, should be copied, reproduced or redistributed in any form nor should it be regarded as an offer or a solicitation of an offer for investment in countries in any jurisdiction in which such an offer or solicitation is not lawful.
div.h6: Copyright, Trademark, Logo, Patent, Intellectual and Other Property Rights
div.p: All copyright, trademark, logo, patent, intellectual and other property rights in the information contained herein is owned by Hamon or its affiliates. No rights of any kind are licensed or assigned or shall otherwise pass to persons accessing such information. Under no circumstances should information contained herein or any part of it be copied, reproduced or redistributed without Hamon’s express written consent.

You acknowledge that content on the website or otherwise available from Hamon (“Content”) is subject to copyright and possibly other intellectual property rights (“IPRs”). Unless expressly permitted by law, you shall not, and shall not permit any other person to, sell, modify, copy, reproduce, distribute, display or publish any Content which you do not own or hold under license or otherwise infringe the IPRs of any person in using this website or any Content.

The website may contain Content posted, emailed or otherwise submitted by you and/or, in the case of the website, by other users of the website (“User Content”). Hamon has the right to access and examine any User Content and may in its absolute discretion move, remove or disable access to User Content or cause the same to be done. You grant Hamon a perpetual, irrevocable, royalty free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, incorporate in other works, distribute and display any information posted, emailed or otherwise submitted by you, in whole or in part.

This website may have links to third party websites, which are not under the control of Hamon. Hamon will incur no liability for any content, service, product or material offered through any linked site. You access third party linked websites at your own risk.

All content on this website is presented only as of the date published or indicated, and may be superseded by subsequent market events or for other reasons. In addition, you are responsible for setting the cache settings on your browser to ensure you are receiving the most recent data.

The rights granted to you herein terminate immediately if you fail to comply with the Terms and Conditions of Use. Hamon, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to temporarily or permanently terminate your access to and use of this website at any time and for any reason whatsoever, without notice or liability. Hamon will not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your access to or use of this website.

If any provision of these Terms and Conditions of Use is deemed unlawful, void, or for any reason unenforceable, then that provision will be deemed severable from these Terms of Use and will not affect the validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions.
Terms and Conditions of Use represent the entire agreement between Hamon and the user relating to the subject matter herein.

We make no warranty or representation of any kind (whether, express, implied or statutory) regarding this website or the materials and information contained or referred to on each page associated with this website. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, we make no warranty or representation of any kind, expressed, implied or statutory that this website can be accessed at all times. This website may, without notice, be temporarily unavailable or restricted for administrative or other reasons.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim any and all liability and will not be liable for any injury, loss, damage or expense (whether special, incidental or consequential) occasioned by or arising, directly or indirectly, from your operation or use of this website.

You will indemnify us (including all Hamon affiliated or associated companies) and our officers, directors, employees and agents in respect of any third-party claim for any injury, loss, damage or expense occasioned by or arising directly or indirectly from your operation or, use of this website or your supply of information to a third party provided in breach of any of your obligations under these Terms and Conditions of Use.

If you transmit any communication through this website to us or our affiliates directly or through any third-party internet or other service provider, you shall be responsible and liable for any omissions or failures that may be made while transmitting or receiving communications using this website. This website is not designed for the transmission of time sensitive instructions or questions. Accordingly, if you use this website to transmit time sensitive instructions or questions, you will be liable for any loss that may arise, and any such information is transmitted at your own risk.

The information on this website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute as investment advice, an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy any security that may be referenced on or through this website. Unless otherwise specified, it is not intended to be directed to any person(s) in particular. Information from this website must not be used in any jurisdiction where prohibited by law and must not be used in a way that would be contrary to local law or legislation. No investment advice, tax advice, or legal advice is provided through this website, and you agree that this website will not be used by you for these purposes. An investment mentioned on this website may not be suitable for all investors and if you are unclear about any of the information on this website, please consult your stockbroker, lawyer, accountant, bank manager or other professional advisor. No representation is given that shares, products, or services identified on, or accessible through, this website are suitable for any particular investor. Investment products referred to by Hamon may not be available to investors in all jurisdictions; it is not available to U.S. Persons.
In case of discrepancies between the English and other language versions of these Terms of Use and content of this website, the English version shall prevail.

These Terms and Conditions of Use shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong, SAR and the courts of Hong Kong, SAR shall have exclusive jurisdiction to hear all disputes arising in connection with these Terms and Conditions.

div.h2: PUBLIC Markets Section of the website

div.h5: This website is owned and operated by Hamon. Your use of this website confirms that you have read and agree to the following Terms and Conditions of Use of this website.
div.p: Please contact your financial advisors or independent professional advisors for specific information and documents (which comprises of the prospectus and product key facts statements), including but not limited to: financial reports, past performance information of share classes other than the representative share class as stated in the product key facts statements, dividend composition information, copies of the latest offering document, and dealing prices.

You are advised to exercise caution. If you are in any doubt about any of the contents of this website, you should talk to your investment advisor or seek independent professional advice if you do not have an advisor. If you are a financial advisor or an institution, please contact Hamon for further information.

The investment strategies referred to in this website may not be suitable for all investors nor are they an endorsement of the suitability for any particular investor or class of investors. Any investments or investment products referred to are NOT FOR SALE IN THE U.S. OR TO U.S. PERSONS. By accessing this website you represent that you are permitted by the laws of your jurisdiction of residence to access this site and the information contained herein.

Nothing contained within this website should be construed as investment advice. The investment solutions through the investment strategies may not be suitable for all investors and should only be made on the basis of the relevant Offering Document (which may comprise of the prospectus, supplement and product key facts statements) or other related offering documents and their terms and conditions. The prices contained in this website are indicative only and should not be relied upon for dealing. Portfolio characteristics may vary from time to time from what is shown. Investors should not base their investment decisions solely on information presented in the materials relating to Hamon portfolios (such as information contained in this website).
div.h6: Copyright, Trademark, Logo, Patent, Intellectual and Other Property Rights
div.p: All copyright, trademark, logo, patent, intellectual and other property rights in the information contained herein is owned by Hamon or its affiliates. No rights of any kind are licensed or assigned or shall otherwise pass to persons accessing such information. Under no circumstances should information contained herein or any part of it be copied, reproduced or redistributed without Hamon’s express written consent.

You acknowledge that content on the website or otherwise available from Hamon (“Content”) is subject to copyright and possibly other intellectual property rights (“IPRs”). Unless expressly permitted by law, you shall not, and shall not permit any other person to, sell, modify, copy, reproduce, distribute, display or publish any Content which you do not own or hold under license or otherwise infringe the IPRs of any person in using this website or any Content.

The website may contain Content posted, emailed or otherwise submitted by you and/or, in the case of the website, by other users of the website (“User Content”). Hamon has the right to access and examine any User Content and may in its absolute discretion move, remove or disable access to User Content or cause the same to be done. You grant Hamon a perpetual, irrevocable, royalty free license to use, reproduce, modify, adapt, publish, translate, incorporate in other works, distribute and display any information posted, emailed or otherwise submitted by you, in whole or in part.

This website may have links to third party websites, which are not under the control of Hamon. Hamon will incur no liability for any content, service, product or material offered through any linked site. You access any third party linked websites at your own risk.

All content on this website is presented only as at the date published or indicated, and may be superseded by subsequent market events or for other reasons. In addition, you are responsible for setting the cache settings on your browser to ensure you are receiving the most recent data.

The rights granted to you herein terminate immediately if you fail to comply with the Terms and Conditions of Use. Hamon, in its sole discretion, reserves the right to temporarily or permanently terminate your access to and use of this website at any time and for any reason whatsoever, without notice or liability. Hamon will not be liable to you or any third party for any termination of your access to or use of this website.

If any provision of these Terms and Conditions of Use is deemed unlawful, void, or for any reason unenforceable, then that provision will be deemed severable from these Terms of Use and will not affect the validity and enforceability of the remaining provisions.
Terms and Conditions of Use represent the entire agreement between Hamon and the user relating to the subject matter herein.

ul.li: Investments involve risk. Past performance is not indicative of or guarantee of future performance. Please note that the price of shares and the income from them can fall as well as rise and investors may not get back the amount originally invested.
Income receivable may vary from the amount of income projected at the time of making the investment.
Exchange rate fluctuations may affect the value of an investment and any income derived from it.
If you exercise any right to redeem, you may not get back the amount initially invested if the share price has fallen since you invested.
There can be no guarantee that the tax position or proposed tax position prevailing at the time of the investment will not change.
Dividends and capital gains on shares issued may be subject to withholding taxes imposed by the countries.

div.p: The list of risk factors is not exhaustive and you should refer to the Offering Document or other related offering documents for additional risk factors pertaining to the investments. You should not invest based on the information on this website alone and should read the Offering Document or other related offering documents for details including the risk factors before making any investment decisions.

We make no warranty or representation of any kind (whether, express, implied or statutory) regarding this website or the materials and information contained or referred to on each page associated with this website. Without limiting the generality of the foregoing, we make no warranty or representation of any kind, expressed, implied or statutory that this website can be accessed at all times. This website may, without notice, be temporarily unavailable or restricted for administrative or other reasons.

To the fullest extent permitted by law, we disclaim any and all liability and will not be liable for any injury, loss, damage or expense (whether special, incidental or consequential) occasioned by or arising, directly or indirectly, from your operation or use of this website.

You will indemnify us (including all Hamon affiliated or associated companies) and our officers, directors, employees and agents in respect of any third-party claim for any injury, loss, damage or expense occasioned by or arising directly or indirectly from your operation or, use of this website or your supply of information to a third party provided in breach of any of your obligations under these Terms and Conditions of Use.

If you transmit any communication through this website to us or our affiliates directly or through any third-party internet or other service provider, you shall be responsible and liable for any omissions or failures that may be made while transmitting or receiving communications using this website. This website is not designed for the transmission of time sensitive instructions or questions. Accordingly, if you use this website to transmit time sensitive instructions or questions, you will be liable for any loss that may arise, and any such information is transmitted at your own risk.

The information on this website is for informational purposes only and does not constitute as investment advice, an offer to sell or a solicitation of an offer to buy any security that may be referenced on or through this website. Unless otherwise specified, it is not intended to be directed to any person(s) in particular. Information from this website must not be used in any jurisdiction where prohibited by law and must not be used in a way that would be contrary to local law or legislation. No investment advice, tax advice, or legal advice is provided through this website, and you agree that this website will not be used by you for these purposes. An investment mentioned on this website may not be suitable for all investors and if you are unclear about any of the information on this website, please consult your stockbroker, lawyer, accountant, bank manager or other professional advisor. No representation is given that shares, products, or services identified on, or accessible through, this website are suitable for any particular investor. Investment products referred to by Hamon may not be available to investors in all jurisdictions; it is not available to U.S. Persons.
In case of discrepancies between the English and other language versions of these Terms of Use and content of this website, the English version shall prevail.

These Terms and Conditions of Use shall be governed by and interpreted in accordance with the laws of Hong Kong, SAR and the courts of Hong Kong, SAR shall have exclusive jurisdiction to hear all disputes arising in connection with these Terms and Conditions.
